definition: variant of 彷彿|仿佛[fang3 fu2]
Foshan prefecture-level city in Guangdong 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3]
Living Buddha/title of Mongolian Lamas from 17th century

sentences.english: This is the ancient origins of the rise of Buddhism and Taoism in the pre-existing folk activities.
sentences.chinese: 這是源流古者在佛道教興起前就有的民俗活動。

sentences.english: I hear as if sing lonely to me.
sentences.chinese: 我徬佛聽到寂寞懟莪唱歌。

sentences.english: Hiya, Rog. Frank, you all set?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，你好，羅格。佛蘭克，你都搞定了嗎？

sentences.english: Photo taken at Buddha Park, also known as Wat Xieng Khuan 25 km southeast from Vientiane.
sentences.chinese: 在佛公園攝，也寺昆萬象25公里東南衆所周知的。

sentences.english: When an object pops up, the mirror will reflect it and when it disappears, there will be nothing in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 應該像佛菩薩的大圓鏡智，物來則顯，物去則空。

sentences.english: Buddha Bodhisattva only bless people willing to help themselves.
sentences.chinese: 佛菩薩只保佑那些肯幫助自己的人。

sentences.english: It represents the Dharmakaya of Buddha, so one can put it on altar and worship.
sentences.chinese: 此代表法身佛，故可置於佛堂上供奉。

sentences.english: By this time Felice's tears began to blind her.
sentences.chinese: 這時候淚水開始矇住了佛艾麗絲的眼睛。

sentences.english: The continuing education system for teachers was first established by Buddha Shakyamuni.
sentences.chinese: 教師進修的制度是釋迦牟尼佛首創的。

sentences.english: The first portion discusses the development and the formation of OuYi"s opinions concerning integrating Confucianism with Buddhism."
sentences.chinese: 第一部分論述澫益儒佛融通思想的發展與形成。

sentences.english: Frank doesn't care if Harry leaves or stays.
sentences.chinese: 佛蘭克根本不在意哈里是去還是留。

sentences.english: This is Maitreya, the Buddha of the future.
sentences.chinese: 這是彌勒佛，也就是未來佛。

sentences.english: Fossett focused on sailing and aviation.
sentences.chinese: 佛施特的興趣焦點放在航海。

sentences.english: I would like to tell you the story of my encounter with the Buddha inside me.
sentences.chinese: 我想要跟你講講我遇見自己內心那個佛的故事。
佛斯特鮑特鎮又有錢了。

definition: Buddha (a person who has attained Buddhahood, or specifically Siddhartha Gautama)
to become a Buddha/to attain enlightenment
Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
Amitabha Buddha/the Buddha of the Western paradise/may the lord Buddha preserve us!/merciful Buddha!
Sakyamuni Buddha (Sanskrit: sage of the Sakya)/Siddhartha Gautama (563-485 BC), the historical Buddha and founder of Buddhism
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva, the Bodhisattva of the Great Vow (to save all souls before accepting Bodhi)/also translated Earth Treasury, Earth Womb, or Earth Store Bodhisattva
Siddhartha Gautama (563-485 BC), the historical Buddha and founder of Buddhism/Sakyamuni Buddha (Sanskrit: sage of the Sakya)
